response.overview: Athena Gracen finds herself in a nightmare scenario, trapped in a mangled and overturned vehicle, her heart racing as she tries to make sense of the chaos around her. In her moment of desperation, she reaches for her phone and calls 911, praying for a miracle. On the other end of the line; Cathy Willows, a calm and composed 911 dispatcher reassures Athena that help is on the way.
response.title: Because you Answered
